subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
Good Day and compliment of the season. I hope this message meets you in
good health. It has been a very long time. I'm happy to inform you about my
success in getting the fund transferred under the cooperation of a new
partner from London . Presently Iâ€™m in London for investment projects with
my own share of the total sum.
Meanwhile, I didn't forget your past efforts and attempts to assist us in
transferring those funds despite the fact that it failed us somehow. Now contact my
secretary, her name is Mrs. Nancy Henshew ask her to send you the total US
$1,500.000.00, which I kept for your compensation for all the past efforts
and attempts to assist me in this matter. I appreciated your efforts at
that time very much. So feel free and get in touch with my secretary Mrs.
Nancy Henshew with your information and instruct her where to send the
amount to you. Below is her email address contact:
Name: Mrs. Nancy Henshew
Email Address:  
nancy_henshew@yahoo.com
Please do let me know immediately you receive it so that we can share the
joy after all the suffering at that time. At the moment, I am very busy
here because of the investment projects which I and the new partner are
having at hand. Finally, remember that I had forwarded instruction to my
secretary on your behalf to receive that money, so feel free to get in
touch with Mrs. Nancy Henshew and she will send the amount to you without
any delay. I wait to hear from you ASAP notifying me if you have received
your draft from her.
With best regards
Mr. James Eke.

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Mr. James Eke,

I hope this message finds you well. It's been a while indeed! I'm glad to hear about your success with the fund and your new investment projects in London. That sounds very exciting!

It's very kind of you to remember my past efforts, even though they didn't quite pan out as we had hoped. I appreciate your thoughtfulness.

I will get in touch with Mrs. Nancy Henshew as per your instructions. Just to clarify, is there any specific information she might need from me? Also, could you please tell me more about the draft that she will be sending?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Malcolm
